channel.title: Please help me
channel.description:
hi. how do i change the little welcome window that pops up when you log in saying welcome to torvapkz.
as you can tell im using torvapkz 317. thanks please help

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

the message that pops up when u log in? , u change that inside the cache , which should be located in my computer - C Drive , just replace it with the image u want or if u dont know how just click edit on it and use paint and just color over it with paint a plain color like gray… in the cache u can also change background of log in screen and other images in game … if u mean welcome message like text in chatbox or something , thats in ur source in like client.java , clicking buttons.java and config.java

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Get a program capable of a recursive file search… Or, you can be stubborn and manually check every single file until you find it. Your choice.

http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/release/indigo/r

My personal preference.

Read full topic
